sentences.sentence: How it works: Papaya contains papain, an exfoliant that helps slough dead skin.
sentences.translation: 作用：番木瓜含有木瓜蛋白酶，一种有助于皮屑脱落的物质。

sentences.sentence: Been thinking I needed a good exfoliant so I tried this based on the fact I like pomegranate. Bonus was my body was really soft afterwards without applying moisturizer.
sentences.translation: 一直在想，我需要一个良好的身体去角质，这个以石榴为基础的去角质真的让我的身体变得嫩滑！
